name: Multicolor Black Silk Shibori Scarf
description:
A lovely hand dyed silk shibori scarf in dark pink, aqua, and black, is hand dyed on soft light weight chiffon silk. It's the perfect size to wear as a shawl or wrap adn it's elegant and modern style makes it perfect for any season. Created by the artist using Japanese shibori, it is absolutely unique and one-of-a-kind. 

Approx. size: 20” x 85” when ironed flat.

Easy care, just hand wash in cool water, lay on towels to dry, and lightly iron. 

Please visit:
http://www.ohsuzanni.com 
to see more of my scarves collection.

name: Black Silk Shibori Scarf Wrap Hand Dyed in Mauve, Salmon, Black
description:
A lovely hand dyed silk shibori scarf in black with shades of bright salmon, orange, and pink. Hand dyed on soft chiffon silk, it's a great light weight scarf and the perfect size to wear as a shawl or wrap. Stunning for any season, it has an elegant and modern style. Created by the artist using Japanese shibori, it is absolutely unique and one-of-a-kind.

Easy care, just hand wash in cool water, lay on towels to dry, and lightly iron.

name: Hand Dyed Silk Shibori Scarf in Salmon
description:
A lovely hand dyed silk shibori scarf in bright salmon, orange, and purple. Hand made on soft chiffon silk, it's a great light weight scarf and the perfect size to wear as a shawl or wrap. Stunning for any event and has an elegant and modern style. Created by the artist using Japanese arashi shibori, it is absolutely unique and one-of-a-kind. 

Approx. size: 20” x 85” when ironed flat.

Easy care, just hand wash in cool water, lay on towels to dry, and lightly iron. 

Please visit:

name: Silk Scarf Wrap in Brown Hand Dyed Shibori
description:
Hand dyed silk scarf in brown and tan arashi stripe has an elegant and modern style. Hand made on chiffon silk, it's a great light weight scarf and the perfect size to wear as a shawl or wrap. I created this scarf using the Japanese arashi shibori wrap-resist method for dyeing fabric - it is absolutely unique and one-of-a-kind. 

Approx. size: 20” x 85” 

Easy care: Just hand wash in cool water, lay on towels to dry, and lightly iron. 

Please visit:
http://www.ohsuzanni.com 
to see more of my scarves collection.

name: Hand Dyed Silk Scarf - Purple Shibori Scarf
description:
Hand dyed silk scarf in rich purple and mauve multicolor has hand pleated texture and an elegant and modern style. Hand made on soft habotai silk, it's a great light weight scarf and the perfect size to wear as a shawl or wrap. Stunning for any event. I created this scarf using the Japanese arashi shibori wrap-resist method for dyeing fabric - it is absolutely unique and one-of-a-kind. 

Approx. size: 22” x 70” when ironed flat.

Dry cleaning is suggested to retain the hand pleated texture. To remove texture, just hand wash in cool water, lay on towels to dry, and lightly iron. 

Please visit:
http://www.ohsuzanni.com 
to see more of my scarves collection.
